title: Rageblade needs to be replaced or reworked.
body: It's been abused enough already this season m 1st Jax,  now Yi, Xin, and Kog etc. I get that Riot wants this item to be usable,  but in it's current state it can't be balanced properly.

Kat was actually strong before the nerfs, though. Even now, she isn't as easy to counter as she seems. Yes, she is easy to counter during the lane phase, but it requires a great amount of team coordination to stop her because she will roam, she will get kills, she will snowball and she will have the potential to destroy on teamfights. Team coordiation is something that is incredibly difficult to have on SoloQ, especially on lower elos.

This isn't to say that Kat is not balanced, just that calling other "low elo kids" because Kat has been nerfed is not fair.

Take {{champion:268}} for example, he has been the reverse of Katarina. Balanced at lower elos, but incredibly OP on very high elo and at competitive play. Just because he has been nerfed for that part of game, does that mean that we have the right to insult high elos for that?

Riot has already explained that they will try to make every champion balanced for all elos.
What makes more sense, balancing for the game played at its highest level or for people who don't understand the game? I will go with option 1.
